very nice game ( i hate ruskie kurwy ez )

I've played this game for about total of 2000 hours  including hours from my second account. This is such a simple first person shooting game that only requires you aiming skills. You'll find some difficulties shooting down your opponents but you will get used to it soon as the game has community-made maps which helps you to practice aiming and character controlling which does almost nothing to your daily game play. What's so great about this game is its official competitions where professional CS:GO players compete, they are so exciting to watch as you can see their skills and strategies on maps you know. Skins are one of the cool features too. CS:GO skins have one of the best designs compared to other games like Apex Legends, Valorant, or Rainbow Six Siege(I'm sorry if I offended you). CS:GO is not just a first person shooting game but also it could be seen as a artwork collecting game.
previously had too much team damage for shooting friends as a joke. threw molly, friend walks through it, and bam. kicked for too much team damage. would rate this game 10/10 lmao.
